content:
Currently the query for multiple loinc codes does not work. The query
http://fhirsandbox.kanta.fi/phr-resourceserver/baseStu3/Observation?patient=5ba3d7aa-35bd-11e9-bb72-8f8be337adf1&_format=json&_pretty=true&_count=2000&code=15074-8,14743-9,14745-4
returns

{ "resourceType": "OperationOutcome", "issue": [ { "severity": "error", "code": "processing", "diagnostics": "Multiple values detected for non-repeatable parameter 'code'. This server is not configured to allow multiple (AND/OR) values for this param." } ] }
Could the search for multiple codes be allowed?
@Mikael Rinnetmäki yes it could, we'll add this to our worklist.
